import React, {useState} from "react"; import 'react-dropzone-uploader/dist/styles.css' import DropzoneComponent from 'react-dropzone-uploader'; export default function Contact() { const [name, setName] = useState() const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [phone, setPhone] = useState() const [description, setDescription] = useState() const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false) const [location, setLocation] = useState() const formFilled = name && email && phone && description && location const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("poop") // SendEmail(e) setSubmitted(true) } return (
Send A Message
Your message has been sent. Thank you!
setName(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="name" placeholder="Your Name" data-rule="minlen:4" data-msg="Please enter at least 4 chars" />
setEmail(e.target.value)} className="form-control" name="email" id="email" placeholder="Your Email" data-rule="email" data-msg="Please enter a valid email" />
setPhone(e.target.value)} className="form-control" name="phone" id="phone" data-rule="required" placeholder="Phone Number" />
